articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: Gumloop, founded in a bedroom in Vancouver, lets users automate tasks with drag-and-drop modules - TechCrunch
articles.description: Gumloop, a four-person company building a drag-and-drop workflow automation platform, has raised $17 million in venture funding.
articles.content: Developers Max Brodeur-Urbas and Rahul Behal think that AI has the potential to automate lots of business-relevant tasks, but that many of the AI-powered automation tools on the market today are unre… [+3189 chars]
